# nexus-accordion

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                            | Type                                   | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `open`   | `open`    | Whether the accordion is open.                         | `boolean`                              | `false` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Adjust Accordion inner content padding left and right. | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'md'`  |


## Events

| Event         | Description                                              | Type               |
| ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `toggleEvent` | Event fired when the accordion header button is clicked. | `CustomEvent<any>` |


----------------------------------------------
